verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and to Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto them When any אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> man כִּ֤י <WH3588> When יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> has זָ֣ב <WH2100> hath a running issue מִבְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> out of his flesh זוֹב֖וֹ <WH2101> [because of] his issue טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> he [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְזֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become טֻמְאָת֖וֹ <WH2932> And this shall be his uncleanness בְּזוֹב֑וֹ <WH2101> in his issue רָ֣ר <WH7325> run בְּשָׂר֞וֹ <WH1320> whether his flesh אֶת־ <WH854> for זוֹב֗וֹ <WH2101> with his issue אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or הֶחְתִּ֤ים <WH2856> be stopped בְּשָׂרוֹ֙ <WH1320> or his flesh מִזּוֹב֔וֹ <WH2101> from his issue טֻמְאָת֖וֹ <WH2932> it [is] his uncleanness הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ב <WH4904> Every bed אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> whereon he lieth עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> with הַזָּ֖ב <WH2100> that hath the issue יִטְמָ֑א <WH2930> is unclean וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> Every הַכְּלִ֛י <WH3627> and every thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> whereon he sitteth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> shall be unclean

וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> And whosoever אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִגַּ֖ע <WH5060> toucheth בְּמִשְׁכָּב֑וֹ <WH4904> his bed יְכַבֵּ֧ס <WH3526> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְהַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> And he that sitteth עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַכְּלִ֔י <WH3627> on [any] thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> whereon he sat עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> with הַזָּ֑ב <WH2100> that hath the issue יְכַבֵּ֧ס <WH3526> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְהַנֹּגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> And he that toucheth בִּבְשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> the flesh הַזָּ֑ב <WH2100> of him that hath the issue יְכַבֵּ֧ס <WH3526> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> if יָרֹ֛ק <WH7556> spit הַזָּ֖ב <WH2100> And if he that hath the issue בַּטָּה֑וֹר <WH2889> upon him that is clean וְכִבֶּ֧ס <WH3526> then he shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every הַמֶּרְכָּ֗ב <WH4817> And what saddle אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִרְכַּ֥ב <WH7392> soever he rideth עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> with הַזָּ֖ב <WH2100> upon that hath the issue יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> shall be unclean

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Whoever הַנֹּגֵ֗עַ <WH5060> And whosoever toucheth בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> any אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become תַחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> were under יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> any thing that was under him shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> until the even וְהַנּוֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> and he that beareth אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> יְכַבֵּ֧ס <WH3526> [any of] those things shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יִגַּע־ <WH5060> And whomsoever he toucheth בּוֹ֙ הַזָּ֔ב <WH2100> that hath the issue וְיָדָ֖יו <WH3027> his hands לֹא־ <WH3808> without שָׁטַ֣ף <WH7857> and hath not rinsed בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> in water וְכִבֶּ֧ס <WH3526> he shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וּכְלִי־ <WH3627> And the vessel חֶ֛רֶשׂ <WH2789> of earth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִגַּע־ <WH5060> that he toucheth בּ֥וֹ הַזָּ֖ב <WH2100> which hath the issue יִשָּׁבֵ֑ר <WH7665> shall be broken וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every כְּלִי־ <WH3627> and every vessel עֵ֔ץ <WH6086> of wood יִשָּׁטֵ֖ף <WH7857> shall be rinsed בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> in water

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> now when יִטְהַ֤ר <WH2891> is cleansed הַזָּב֙ <WH2100> And when he that hath an issue מִזּוֹב֔וֹ <WH2101> of his issue וְסָ֨פַר <WH5608> then he shall number ל֜וֹ שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> to himself seven יָמִ֛ים <WH3117> days לְטָהֳרָת֖וֹ <WH2893> for his cleansing וְכִבֶּ֣ס <WH3526> and wash בְּגָדָ֑יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֧ץ <WH7364> and bathe בְּשָׂר֛וֹ <WH1320> his flesh בְּמַ֥יִם <WH4325> water חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> in running וְטָהֵֽר׃ <WH2891> and shall be clean

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֗י <WH8066> And on the eighth יִֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> he shall take לוֹ֙ שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> to him two תֹרִ֔ים <WH8449> turtledoves א֥וֹ <WH176> or שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> or two בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> young יוֹנָ֑ה <WH3123> pigeons וּבָ֣א ׀ <WH935> and come לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֙תַח֙ <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּנְתָנָ֖ם <WH5414> and give אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> them unto the priest

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> shall offer אֹתָם֙ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> them the one חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and the other עֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> [for] a burnt offering וְכִפֶּ֨ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> and the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> for him before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מִזּוֹבֽוֹ׃ <WH2101> for his issue ס

וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> And if any man's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now if תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> go out מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> of copulation זָ֑רַע <WH2233> seed וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> from him then he shall wash בַּמַּ֛יִם <WH4325> in water אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> all his flesh וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכָל־ <WH3605> any בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> And every garment וְכָל־ <WH3605> any ע֔וֹר <WH5785> and every skin אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> of copulation זָ֑רַע <WH2233> whereon is the seed וְכֻבַּ֥ס <WH3526> shall be washed בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> with water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even פ

וְאִשָּׁ֕ה <WH802> The woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> shall lie אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> also with whom man אֹתָ֖הּ <WH854> for שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> of copulation זָ֑רַע <WH2233> [with] seed וְרָחֲצ֣וּ <WH7364> they shall [both] bathe בַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> [themselves] in water וְטָמְא֖וּ <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And if a woman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> has זָבָ֔ה <WH2101> [and] her issue דָּ֛ם <WH1818> be blood יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall continue זֹבָ֖הּ <WH2100> have an issue בִּבְשָׂרָ֑הּ <WH1320> in her flesh שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall continue בְנִדָּתָ֔הּ <WH5079> she shall be put apart וְכָל־ <WH3605> and whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> and whosoever toucheth בָּ֖הּ יִטְמָ֥א <WH2930> her shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> Everything אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> And every thing that she lieth עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and בְּנִדָּתָ֖הּ <WH5079> upon in her separation יִטְמָ֑א <WH2930> shall be unclean וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> and everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תֵּשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> every thing also that she sitteth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> upon shall be unclean

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Anyone הַנֹּגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> And whosoever toucheth בְּמִשְׁכָּבָ֑הּ <WH4904> her bed יְכַבֵּ֧ס <WH3526> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Whoever הַנֹּגֵ֔עַ <WH5060> And whosoever toucheth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִ֖י <WH3627> any thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that she sat עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and יְכַבֵּ֧ס <WH3526> upon shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְאִ֨ם <WH518> Whether עַֽל־ <WH5921> it be on הַמִּשְׁכָּ֜ב <WH4904> And if it [be] on [her] bed ה֗וּא <WH1931> he א֧וֹ <WH176> or עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַכְּלִ֛י <WH3627> or on any thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִ֥וא <WH1931> she יֹשֶֽׁבֶת־ <WH3427> whereon she sitteth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and בְּנָגְעוֹ־ <WH5060> when he toucheth ב֑וֹ יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> it he shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְאִ֡ם <WH518> If שָׁכֹב֩ <WH7901> lie יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <WH7901> with her at all אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And if any man אֹתָ֗הּ <WH854> for וּתְהִ֤י <WH1961> become נִדָּתָהּ֙ <WH5079> and her flowers עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and וְטָמֵ֖א <WH2930> be upon him he shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ב <WH4904> and all the bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> whereon he lieth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> shall be unclean פ

וְאִשָּׁ֡ה <WH802> And if a woman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now if יָזוּב֩ <WH2100> have ז֨וֹב <WH2101> an issue דָּמָ֜הּ <WH1818> of her blood יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> many בְּלֹא֙ <WH3808> out עֶת־ <WH6256> of the time נִדָּתָ֔הּ <WH5079> of her separation א֥וֹ <WH176> or כִֽי־ <WH3588> if תָז֖וּב <WH2100> or if it run עַל־ <WH5921> beyond the time נִדָּתָ֑הּ <WH5079> of her separation כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֞י <WH3117> all the days ז֣וֹב <WH2101> of the issue טֻמְאָתָ֗הּ <WH2932> of her uncleanness כִּימֵ֧י <WH3117> shall be as the days נִדָּתָ֛הּ <WH5079> of her separation תִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> shall continue טְמֵאָ֥ה <WH2931> she [shall be] unclean הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

כָּל־ <WH3605> Any הַמִּשְׁכָּ֞ב <WH4904> Every bed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> whereon she lieth עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days זוֹבָ֔הּ <WH2101> of her issue כְּמִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH4904> shall be unto her as the bed נִדָּתָ֖הּ <WH5079> of her separation יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֑הּ וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and every הַכְּלִי֙ <WH3627> and whatsoever אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> she sitteth עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and טָמֵ֣א <WH2931> upon shall be unclean יִהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> like כְּטֻמְאַ֖ת <WH2932> as the uncleanness נִדָּתָֽהּ׃ <WH5079> of her separation
